response: "I feel like I'm constantly suffocating under the weight of society's expectations."
"No matter how hard I try, it never feels like enough. I'm losing sight of who I really am."
"I can't escape this endless cycle of comparison and self-doubt. It's driving me insane."
"Everyone expects me to have it all together, but I'm falling apart on the inside."
"I don't understand why I have to fit into this narrow definition of 'perfect'. It's impossible."
"The pressure to be flawless is consuming me. I can't keep up with these unrealistic standards."
"I'm starting to question my own worth because of society's constant judgment."
"I'm losing touch with reality as I strive for an unattainable ideal."
"I wish I could just break free from these expectations and be accepted for who I truly am."
"The more I try to please everyone else, the more I lose myself in the process."
